name: Drug Process Licensing Associates
overview:
Drug Process Licensing Associates, LLC (DPLA) was founded in 2010. We have decades of experience in the pharmaceutical and chemical industries. Ron Schwarz, DPLA’s founder, has been providing information services to chemical and pharmaceutical sourcing and marketing professionals for more than 25 years. He understands the needs of the industry and knows what it takes to gather reliable information that is constantly up-to-date.

DPLA has 2 lines of business: • DPLA publishes an online database of generic API and intermediate producers called PHILL. PHILL stands for PHarmaceutical InteLLigence. PHILL is rapidly becoming a must-have tool used by sourcing professionals around the globe. PHILL is maintained by a team of chemists and pharmaceutical experts whose sole responsibility is to provide you with the most accurate information possible on manufacturers of pharmaceutical ingredients. We add information only after a judicious verification process so that we earn your trust in the information you are using in your business.

• DPLA develops manufacturing processes for active ingredients that will soon be generic. The processes are patented by DPLA and are licensed to you for generic business development purposes. Our experience and expertise in this area can help your company bring a generic to market by using our non-infringing, cost effective processes.
